entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Snow beginning early this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 before morning. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023
